forecast.detailedForecast: Snow showers likely. Cloudy. Low around 26, with temperatures rising to around 29 overnight. West northwest wind around 17 mph, with gusts as high as 37 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.shortForecast: Snow Showers Likely then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow showers likely before 7am, then a slight chance of snow between 7am and 10am. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 37. West northwest wind 16 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday

sections.content: Due to the rainy, warm weather, the Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail is icy and is not able to be groomed today, March 4, 2025. There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run. Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.
Please adhere to posted hours. Buck’s Run last day is Sunday, March 9, 2025.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: –  Due to the warm, rainy weather, trails have deteriorated and are not suitable for skiing.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Some of the best skating of the season.  Hard skate deck, freshly groomed, fast but plenty of control.  Single classic track from building and into woods.  The last loop is not tracked, but there is a cutoff straight to the small hill that is tracked.  Lots of leaves with wind, especially in the tracks on the connector.Thanks HM for keeping us going this season.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Red and Blue loops are hard packed and fast with a light skiff of new . There is some wind debris: but no more than minor agility training . LF 7

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails were groomed and tracked on Saturday. Trails will not be groomed until the temperature goes below freezing.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: Some days it rains, and this is one of those days. The slopes were groomed last night. Wet soft snow should be expected today. Bahnhof Race League is cancelled for this evening due to soft snow conditions. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 9 PM. Despite the weather, make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
